code: import React,{useEffect,useState,useContext}from'react';import{useParams,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{ApiContext}from'../App';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ServiceDetail(_ref){let{i18n}=_ref;const{id}=useParams();const{api}=useContext(ApiContext);const[service,setService]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch("".concat(api,"/api/services"),{headers:{'Accept':'application/json'}}).then(r=>r.json()).then(list=>setService(list.find(s=>s.id==id))).catch(()=>{});},[api,id]);if(!service)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:service.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:service.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",service.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/book/".concat(service.id),className:"btn btn-primary",children:i18n.bookNow})]});}
